Detailed Description

The Trfm class is an abstract class that is implemented by Trfm2 and Trfm3.

It provides functionality to translate, scale and rotate objects in 2D and 3D space. Every Spatial Node has a Trfm object.

See also:
Trfm2
Trfm3
Spatial
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Trfm::Trfm (  )

Default constructor.

All matrices set to null and scale set to 1.
